attributes.action: Create community Corona Nurses for single Mums who can’t get help from 111
attributes.additional_details: We need corona nurses to visit severely ill single mums to establish if child is safe, that there is enough food and that over counter medicines are in a safe place. To ensure mum has  been able to contact nursery/school  and let them know it needs a deep clean. To see if mum has anyone to check in on her. Nurses need proper personal protection.
attributes.background: According to 111 hospitals are only admitting those with breathing problems. Currently young mums can be delirious with blurred vision and still not be admitted to hospital for even a drip ..yet still be in charge of most vulnerable children.

rejection.details:
Decisions on the tasks undertaken by nurses are decisions for individual trusts, so we can't publish your petition. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
